Take control of your sales meetings with the Kickscale Meeting Assistant, the ultimate tool for sales professionals. This Chrome extension seamlessly integrates with the Kickscale Platform to help you stay organized, prepared, and efficient.

Key Features:

✓ View Meeting Insights: Access detailed insights from your past sales meetings, including summaries, next steps, and all configured insights, directly within the extension. Stay on top of your follow-ups and ensure nothing slips through the cracks.

✓ Check Question Trackers: Keep track of important questions and tasks with Question Trackers, functioning like a to-do list. Check off completed items and stay focused on what matters most during your sales calls.

✓ Prepare for Upcoming Meetings: Review past interactions with a customer before your next meeting. Quickly refresh your memory on previous discussions, helping you to be better prepared and more effective.

✓ Add comments during your meetings for other teams: Leave comments for product, marketing, leadership, support and other departments.

✓ Schedule Bots for Ongoing Meetings: If you're currently in a meeting, you can easily schedule a bot to join and record the session. The bot will capture the entire conversation, allowing you to focus on the interaction rather than note-taking.

How It Works:

Once you've integrated your calendar on the Kickscale Platform, the extension will display your past and upcoming meetings, along with all associated insights and Question Trackers. During an ongoing meeting, you can add comments and schedule bots without leaving the call, ensuring seamless, uninterrupted productivity.

Who Is It For?

The Kickscale Meeting Assistant is designed specifically for sales professionals who want to maximize the effectiveness of their calls. Whether you’re preparing for a high-stakes meeting or reviewing past conversations, this extension keeps you organized and ready to close the deal.

Get Started:

Install the Kickscale Meeting Assistant today and transform the way you manage your sales meetings. Ensure every interaction is captured, analyzed, and turned into actionable insights that drive results.
